typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['EXP_HR_S3']) ~> S3Dump
S3Dump sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ParquetGeneralization
